definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)

sentences.english: The waitress beamed a cheerful welcome to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 女服務員對賓客笑臉相迎。

sentences.english: Everyone you meet deserves to be greeted with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 遇到的每個人都值得你笑臉相迎。

sentences.english: That everyone you meet deserves to be greeted with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 每一個與你相遇的人都值得你笑臉相迎。

sentences.english: But this time folks seemed uber smiley, warm and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 但是這次，人們似乎笑臉相迎，溫暖和友好。

sentences.english: The landlady is a nice person who greets all her customers with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 客氣的人，對每個客人都笑臉相迎。
那位女售貨員笑臉相迎。
